H0.text: What was the name of the daughter of Fred and Wilma Flintstone. Roxie

H1.text: What was the name of the daughter of Fred and Wilma Flintstone. Daisy

H2.text: What was the name of the daughter of Fred and Wilma Flintstone. Candy

H3.text: What was the name of the daughter of Fred and Wilma Flintstone. PEBBLES

A4.text: Pebbles Flintstone is the red-haired daughter of Fred and Wilma Flintstone.

A5.text: Pebbles Flintstone was born at the Bedrock Rockapedic Hospital on February 22, 10,000 BC.
